headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Corning (GLW) After Its 1 Year 83% Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Corning’s current share price still offers value, the recent run up makes the question harder to ignore. The stock last closed at US$92.57, with returns of 3.0% over 7 days, 5.4% over 30 days, 2.1% year to date and 83.0% over 1 year, alongside a very large 3 year gain of 180.9% and 5 year gain of 185.7%. Recent coverage has focused on Corning’s role as a key supplier in technology and communications supply chains, as well as ongoing attention on glass and...
